title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to enhance incentives for renewable energy development in high job-loss zones in metropolitan and micropolitan statistical areas.
content: Green Energy Investment Zone Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow various energy-related tax credits for investment in energy property in high job-loss zones. Amends the American Recovery and Reinvestment Tax Act of 2009 to allow increased grant amounts for investment in energy property in high job-loss zones.
